label: Counter title
name: title
description: Make a title for the timer.

label: Textfield
name: textField
placeholder: You chose date @chosenDate. There is @counter left until that date.
description: Text to go with the counter, @counter specifies the time variable. Other variables: @chosenDate, @months, @weeks, @days, @hours, @minutes, @seconds.

label: Count Up
name: countUp
description: Check to count up from date, instead of down to date.

name: minute
label: Minute
description: Select the minute to count up from or down to.

name: hour
label: Hour
description: Select the hour to count up from or down to, 24 hour format.

name: day
label: Day of month
description: Select the day of the month to count up from or down to.

name: month
label: Select month
description: Select the month to count up from or down to.

name: year
label: Year
description: Select the year to count up from or down to.

name: backgroundImage
label: Background image
description: An optional background image for the Counter.

label: Short format
description: Displays the short format for the date. For example: 2d, 3h and 4m left.
name: enableShortFormat

label: Countdown finished text
name: finishedText
description: This text is displayed when a countdown has finished.
